io.deepstream

Interface RecordMergeStrategy


  • public interface RecordMergeStrategy
    Allows users to reconcile record versions if the data is not correctly in sync ( out of sync record versions )

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.gson.JsonElement merge(Record record, com.google.gson.JsonElement remoteValue, int remoteVersion)
      //TODO: Run this in a thread since its blocking? Whenever a version conflict occurs the MergeStrategy set via Record.setMergeStrategy(RecordMergeStrategy) will be called to merge the data and send the data back to the server.
      This is mainly used for scenarios such as when working on very collaborative records where messages cross on the wire, or for connection drops where the client still updates records in an offline mode.
      Throw an error if the merge fails, but keep in mind that this only means it will postpone the merge conflict until the next remote/local update.

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        com.google.gson.JsonElement merge(Record record,
                                com.google.gson.JsonElement remoteValue,
                                int remoteVersion)
                                  throws RecordMergeStrategyException
        //TODO: Run this in a thread since its blocking? Whenever a version conflict occurs the MergeStrategy set via Record.setMergeStrategy(RecordMergeStrategy) will be called to merge the data and send the data back to the server.
        This is mainly used for scenarios such as when working on very collaborative records where messages cross on the wire, or for connection drops where the client still updates records in an offline mode.
        Throw an error if the merge fails, but keep in mind that this only means it will postpone the merge conflict until the next remote/local update.
        Parameters:
        record - The Record, used to retrieve the local Record.version and data via Record.get()
        remoteValue - The remote value on the server
        remoteVersion - The remote version on the server, used to find out if the remote is ahead of the local
        Returns:
        The merged value
        Throws:
        RecordMergeStrategyException - Thrown if a merge conflict occurs, mainly if any dependent logic doesn't work.
